snippet: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic edged Gaël Monfils, 6-2, 6-7 (4), 7-6 (2), at the Rogers Cup in Toronto.
abstract: Novak Djokovic defeats Gael Monfils and Andy Murray defeats Nick Kyrgios in first round of Rogers Cup tennis tournament; other tennis news noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and AGENCE FRANCE-PRESSE

lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic edged Gaël Monfils, 6-2, 6-7 (4), 7-6 (2), at the Rogers Cup in Toronto.
